slides.title: Executive Summary
content: Project is on track and within budget
All major milestones achieved this quarter
Ready to proceed to next phase

slides.title: Project Overview
slides.content: This quarter we focused on establishing the foundation for our new platform. The development team successfully implemented the core architecture, while the design team completed the user interface mockups. We also conducted extensive user testing to validate our approach.

slides.title: Financial Status
slides.content: The project remains within the allocated budget of $250,000. Current spending is at 68% of the total budget, with most expenses going toward development resources and infrastructure. We expect to finish the quarter at 75% budget utilization.

slides.title: Next Quarter Goals
content: Launch beta version to select users
Complete security audit and compliance review
